definitions.definition: Something, such as a title or abbreviation denoting an attained academic degree or a membership in an organization, which is placed after a name.
Something which is placed after a noun, as "of mine" in "friend of mine".

main_definition: Something, such as a title or abbreviation denoting an attained academic degree or a membership in an organization, which is placed after a name.
secondary_definitions: ( linguistics ) Something which is placed after a noun, as "of mine" in "friend of mine".
